Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI tends to be more uplifting or supportive than teachers, so when I ask for its opinion on something I’ve written it’ll compliment whereas my teacher will have edits to my work. Both are useful and important.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI made me feel good and teachers make me feel bad and dumb.
